testCases.explanation: Palindromes: 'a', 'b', 'c'. Each single character is a palindrome.

description:
Solve the **Palindromic Substrings** problem.

Given a string s, count how many substrings of s are palindromes. A substring is a contiguous sequence of characters within the string.

See the full problem description on [LeetCode](https://leetcode.com/problems/palindromic-substrings/).

examples.explanation: Each single character is a palindrome.

constraints: s consists of lowercase English letters
